alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Columbus; New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 3:39AM EDT until March 27 at 4:45AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... New Hanover County in southeastern North Carolina... Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... East central Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 445 AM EDT. * At 339 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Honey Island, or 11 miles north of Shallotte, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Oak Island, Carolina Beach, Wrightsville Beach, Kure Beach, Holden Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island, Snows Cut, South Masonboro Island, Ocean Crest Pier, Yaupon Beach, North Masonboro Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, St. James, Southport, Northwest, Sandyfield and Makatoka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
